text:
samu#bjitaH | 
tEShAqM ~MviSi#priyANAq-miShaqmUrjaq(gm)q sama#graBImEqSha tEq yOniqrindrA#ya tvA || 
aqpA(gm) rasaqmudva#yasaq(gm)q sUrya#raSmi(gm) saqmABRu#taM | 
aqpA(gm) rasa#syaq yO rasaqstaM ~MvO# gRuhNAmyuttaqmamEqSha tEq yOniqrindrA#ya tvA || 
aqyA viqShThA jaqnayaqn karva#rANiq sa hi GRuNi#ruqrurvarA#ya gAqtuH | 
sa pratyudai$ddhaqruNOq maddhvOq agraq(gg)q svAyAqM ~Myat taqnuvA$M ( ) taqnUmaira#yata | 
uqpaqyAqmagRu#hItO&si praqjApa#tayE tvAq juShTa#M gRuhNAmyEqSha tEq yOni#H praqjApa#tayE tvA || 46
(kOSa#-staqnuvAqM-trayO#daSa ca) (A12)
